Classes/BodyLengthVisitor.html.name: BodyLengthVisitor
Classes/BodyLengthVisitor.html.abstract: Violation visitor customized to collect violations of code blocks that exceed a specified number of lines.

Classes/CodeBlockVisitor.html.name: CodeBlockVisitor
Classes/CodeBlockVisitor.html.abstract: A visitor that collects style violations for all available code blocks.

Classes/DeclaredIdentifiersTrackingVisit.name: DeclaredIdentifiersTrackingVisitor
Classes/DeclaredIdentifiersTrackingVisit.abstract: A specialized ViolationsSyntaxVisitor that tracks declared identifiers per scope while traversing the AST.

Classes/ViolationsSyntaxVisitor.html.name: ViolationsSyntaxVisitor
Classes/ViolationsSyntaxVisitor.html.abstract: A SwiftSyntax SyntaxVisitor that produces absolute positions where violations should be reported.
